title: Moon Over Bourbon Street
description: When New Orleans detective Rick Plazier takes on a client who wants him to investigate her husband, he thinks it's just another cheating spouse case. In an effort to prove her investigative skills are equal to his, Rick's secretary/fact gatherer/collections agent, Amy Chang secretly agrees to represent the woman's husband, who wants his wife followed. As their respective investigations deepen, both Amy and Rick uncover an ancient and deadly paranormal society which holds an annual auction of humans. Amy's disappearance prompts Rick to finally come to terms with his shapeshifting curse and use it to track and rescue her. But can the pair acknowledge the mutual attraction they've fought against and move from bickering into bed?
author: Bonnie Dee
